statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-11 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 20 \, x - 6 , 2 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + 8 \, x + 4 , 2 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 4 , 8 \, x^{2} - 24 \, x - 16 , -3 \, x^{3} - x^{2} + 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
